name: Cilinder Adventures
description:
A little 3dplatformer (and bad) game! my first game and just a prototype.

This 3D platformer , in wich you control a capsule whit cool glasess , get a simple history...Nothing! yes , no history , just fun. the levels are very easy and on the firs version , the time you late on complete the game is of a 5 minutes , but in future monthly updates , I want to add 1-3 levels per update , so , in march of 2021 , there will be 15 levels , and on june , 24!

To change controls , before clicking the button "Play!" to open the .exe file , go to input section.

Developer: Luca Moretti.
